resources.string: Hello from a tutorial. After the ending of the tutorial, you don\'t see it again. Use taps for passing the tutorial. You can click on button \`%1$s\` at the bottom for returning here. In the game, this button restarts the game.
Swipe any direction to move squares.
After every swipe in a random free cell of the field, a square appears - with a probability of 90% - blue, 10% - dark blue.
Combine same-color squares to make a next color square.

Your score is shown here. Each color has its own value - the next is 2 times the previous one, the initial color has a value of 2, the last, respectively - 1024.\nWhen two same-colors combines, the score increases by the value of the next color.
Try to get the score more than %1$d.
Your progress is shown on this bar. Try to make up it on two colors more.
Combine chains of squares to get a combo. The combo is a situation when more than one square combining occurs in one swipe.
You lose when there are no possible swipes. Look at this example.
You win by making the full progress. Look here.
You can turn on an auto mode by fast three clicks on progress. When auto mode is turned on you can\'t play yourself before ending of game or clicking on button \`%1$s\`.
Try to turn on the auto mode.
Good luck, have fun!\nTap to play.
